attributes.action: Allow 16 Year Olds to Drive Cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the Prime Minister to allow 16 year olds to be able to take their driving test from their 16th Birthday instead of their 17th Birthday. This will allow to be able to go straight to collage in the safety of their own car.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
